entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
